name: Excuse Me!
description:
Excuse Me! is the world's first top down flatulence crisis management simulator. Help Peter Le Pétomane on his search for a secluded spot to release his imminent expulsion. Will Peter's gas pass unnoticed or will his flatulence make him infamous? His fate is in your hands!

Excuse Me! was designed for the A Game By Its Cover (AGBIC) competition. The premise of the competition was to design a game based upon a previously existing fictitious game cartridge. Excuse Me! was based upon Excuse Me! by mushbuh.

The programming was done by PKBT.
